bell_schedule.//: 1 is Monday, 2 is Tuesday, 3 is Wed, 4 is Thursday, 5 is Friday.
bell_schedule.1: Zero Period is from 7:20 to  8:10 AM. 1st Period is from 8:15 to 9:09. Announcements from 9:13 to 9:19 AM. Second Period is from 9:19 to 10:13. Brunch is from 10:13 to 10:33. Third Period is from 10:37 to 11:31. 4th Period is from 11:35 to 12:29. Lunch is from 12:29 to   1:04. 5th Period is from 1:08 to 2:02. Last period of the day 6th Period is from 2:06 to 3PM.
